p: The study area covers Changchun, the capital city of Jilin Province, located between latitude 43°26’ to 45°03’ north and longitude 124°50’ to 127°2’ east. Changchun consists of 10 counties distributed over 20,660 km 2 of land. The total population was 7.6 million. The annual mean temperature is about 5.8°C. The annual rainfall is typically 552.6 mm. The annual average sunshine time in the province is 2501.7 hours (the above meteorological data are the average for nearly 30 years.).
